source:
TEXT_BANANA506_03063_SEQ_00The night is dark and full of terrors, and Eshana wants for light.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANANA506_03063_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
※本クエストは受注時のクラス・ジョブでのみ進行します。

カステッルム・ベロジナのエシャナは、夜間巡回の光を求めているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANANA506_03063_TODO_00<tab>Use gazelle meat to lure out fattened sarcosuchus at the Velodyna River and slay them for their lard.
target:
TEXT_BANANA506_03063_TODO_00ベロジナ川のにを使い
現れたからを入手

source: TEXT_BANANA506_03063_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the sarcosuchus lard to Eshana.

TEXT_BANANA506_03063_ESHANA_000_000You are the light that guidesss us, comrade. As such, I would have you prepare the lampsss we use for night patrol.
...Was that funny? I tried to jessst as you striders do.
target:
TEXT_BANANA506_03063_ESHANA_000_000シュー……同志よ、君は我らを導く光だ。
ゆえに、夜間巡回に用いる、ランプの光の支度を頼みたい。
…………ヒト風に冗談を言ってみたのだが、通じたか？

source: TEXT_BANANA506_03063_ESHANA_000_001<tab>But jests aside, I need you to hunt sarcosuchus and harvessst their lard. Two pails' worth should sssuffice.
target:
TEXT_BANANA506_03063_ESHANA_000_001……ともかく、「」を、
2つほど集めてくれるとありがたい。
脂の乗った「」を倒せば、得られよう。

source: TEXT_BANANA506_03063_ESHANA_000_002<tab>Here, take these cuts of gazelle meat and lay them along the Velodyna River. The sssmell should lure out the greediest, fattest creatures.
target:
TEXT_BANANA506_03063_ESHANA_000_002奴は、姿を隠しているが、この「」が好物でな。
これをベロジナ川付近に置けば、食欲旺盛な奴が、
臭いにつられて現れるだろう……頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_BANANA506_03063_ESHANA_000_010<tab>Ah, our guiding light returnsss. Tell me, were you able to obtain the sarcosuchus lard?
target:
TEXT_BANANA506_03063_ESHANA_000_010シュー……よくぞ戻った。
は、首尾よく集まったか？

source: TEXT_BANANA506_03063_ESHANA_000_011<tab>Excellent. With this much lard, we shall have sssufficient light for a good many patrolsss. The refined oil burns long and ssstrong, and we Ananta have used it for our torches and bonfires since ancient timesss.
target:
TEXT_BANANA506_03063_ESHANA_000_011シュー……これだけあれば、当面問題なく夜間巡回ができよう。
この油脂から作った油は、少量でも長時間燃えるゆえ、
頻繁に油を足さずともよいのだ。

source: TEXT_BANANA506_03063_ESHANA_000_012<tab>And that is not all of its applicationsss. The refining process leaves behind a by-product that makes a nourishing sssalve. There is no better cure for dry skin and scales.
target:
TEXT_BANANA506_03063_ESHANA_000_012我らアナンタも、古くから松明や篝火に利用してきた。
それに、油を作る際に生じる油薬には、
肌や鱗の潤いを保つ効用がある点も、大いに気に入っている。

source:
TEXT_BANANA506_03063_ESHANA_000_013So you sssee, not only are you the light that guidesss; you are also the sssalve that beautifiesss.
...How was that? Are my jests improving?
target:
TEXT_BANANA506_03063_ESHANA_000_013つまり、君は夜の光とともに、我らアナンタの肌と鱗にも……
……いや、やはり、礼のみにとどめておこう。
ありがとう。
